channel.title: I just got my server up and i need a lil help!
channel.description:
well this is my first time hosting a server and a need a lil know how..
how do i change peoples stats (mod,admin,owner) how do i code the training items (bales,doors,dummys)
i think thats all for now..

item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“00nicework00, post:3, topic:113269”]ok… then do i copy that into “owner” file?[/quote] u aren’t copying anything…u open up character files and click the username and look for what scriptz posted…u change character rights which is 0 to w]e number u want…then close and save

item.title: I just got my server up and i need a lil help!
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:
@scriptz wrote:

well i can help you only with change peoples stats
First go to you server file…
Open Characters Then search for name which you want to give…
Now when you open the name file set the rights 1,2,3

it will look like this:

character-height = 0
character-posx = 3258
character-posy = 3432
character-rights = 0

1-Mod
2-Admin
3-Owner

Read full topic
